sprunked-2-0.title: Sprunked 2.0
sprunked-2-0.slogan: Immerse Yourselves in the Dark Sounds of Sprunked 2.0 (Incredibox Mod)!
sprunked-2-0.description: Experience the enhanced realm of Sprunked 2.0 where revamped characters and intensified horror visuals merge to create an immersive gameplay adventure.

HomeIframe.title: Sprunked 2.0: Enter the Dark
HomeIframe.description: Dive into the enigmatic world of Sprunked 2.0 with its shadowy settings and haunting sounds where mystery awaits at every turn.

HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Sprunked 2.0 Mod of Incredibox introduces a darker realm with redesigned characters and haunting visuals. This mod heightens suspense with eerie landscapes.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Choose Enhanced Characters: Pick from an array of overhauled characters that enrich the suspense and musical depth.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Mix and Match Sounds: Drag and drop to build an eerie soundtrack characterized by haunting beats.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Unlock Horror Bonuses: Combine characters uniquely to unveil special effects and animations.
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Each character has been crafted with a horror-inspired redesign to elevate the game's chilling atmosphere.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Dark, shadowed art styles create an immersive, suspenseful environment.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Richer soundscapes provide options for crafting deep, haunting mixes.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Discover hidden combos that activate unique animations and sounds, perfect for the horror theme.
